Being Wrong on the Internet

Some people make things, some people craft them. How can you tell the difference? Attention to detail. In this podcast from CGP Grey and Brady Haran, entitled Being Wrong on the Internet, you get an idea of what goes in to handcrafting a beautiful piece of well researchedÂ Internet. Enjoy.
